name: BaGooGoo Beta
description: • This is a beta of this game. The full version will be coming... SOON! It is styled like a metriod game (AKA Metriodvania) The game has what I like to call... a modern retro look to the game, as well as the soud fxs. This game was made in Python.Here is a link to the Microsoft Makecode version:https://makecode.com/_1q6TzcYyjgyY
